reviews.text: An old project but very spacious and has numerous facilities. There is a restaurant called 'Thai Pan' open to public. There are 4 tennis courts (need to book in advance), table tennis room, squash court, swimming pool, gym, steam room and sauna. Also there are BBQ pits alongside the swimming pool. There are side gates which allows entry into an underpass which will lead to East Coast Park.

Mandarin Gardens is a 99-years leasehold condominium located at Siglap Road in District D15. Mandarin Gardens is close to Bedok MRT EW5. ... Mandarin Gardens is accessible via Marine Parade Road and East Coast Parkway (ECP).

Huge sprawling condominium. Lots of parking spots for visitors. The individual units are also spacious. Has full facilities, table tennis, Squash, tennis, badminton/footsie,  swimming pool, sauna and steam bath.
Very beautiful location with all facilities in one place for stay.  This is cluster of condominiums.

Nice place. Have been living here for almost a year. Good facilities, a restaurant, gym, even a kinderharden and a supermarket. Kind of sad for the chinese restaurant to close down. Area looks kind of old but it has a nice feeling to it. It is big as well. Recommended to take a walk around the area to familiarise yourself with the area, so as to not get lost. Not very happy with alot of birds around my area but i have gotten use to it.
